name: The Evening
description:
This is made for the Houdini Game Jam 2022, under the theme "Against the Odds".

Your task is to turn each side of the dice into even numbers - by rolling onto number manipulating tiles. 

It may seem like an easy task at first. However, things escalate quickly, and they could start to look confusing. Don't lose hope, and don't panic! Stay calm while thinking and trying your way out. If it ends up like a hopeless mess - don't worry, you can start over at any time!

When you succeed, you will find the Good Evening 🌙 awaiting.

Controls: 

  • Use ↑↓← → on the keyboard to play.
  • Use Space to show the hidden faces.

Made by: 6dy, Qin, Alva, Ziyi
